title: Getting Started
description: Learn how to set up and use nextai translator

hero.title: Get Started with nextai translator
hero.subtitle: Follow this guide to install and configure nextai translator in minutes

step1.title: Download & Install
step1.description: Download the app for your platform and run the installer

step2.title: Configure API Keys
step2.description: Add your AI provider API keys in settings

step3.title: Start Translating
step3.description: Select text and use the shortcut to translate

windows.title: Windows
steps: Download the Windows installer (.exe)
Run the installer and follow the setup wizard
Launch nextai translator from the Start menu
Complete the initial setup

macos.title: macOS
steps: Download the macOS installer (.dmg)
Open the DMG file and drag the app to Applications
Launch nextai translator from Applications
Allow necessary permissions when prompted

linux.title: Linux
steps: Download the appropriate package for your distribution
Install using your package manager or AppImage
Launch nextai translator from your application menu
Complete the initial setup

chrome.title: Chrome/Edge
steps: Visit the Chrome Web Store
Click 'Add to Chrome'
Pin the extension to your toolbar
Click the icon to configure settings

firefox.title: Firefox
steps: Visit Firefox Add-ons
Click 'Add to Firefox'
Grant necessary permissions
Click the icon to configure settings

apiKeys.title: Setting Up API Keys
apiKeys.description: nextai translator supports multiple AI providers. You'll need at least one API key to use the translation features.

openai.title: OpenAI
steps: Visit platform.openai.com
Create an account or sign in
Navigate to API Keys section
Create a new API key
Copy the key and paste it in nextai translator settings

anthropic.title: Anthropic Claude
steps: Visit console.anthropic.com
Create an account or sign in
Navigate to API Keys
Generate a new key
Add the key to nextai translator

google.title: Google Gemini
steps: Visit makersuite.google.com
Create or sign in to your account
Get your API key
Add it to nextai translator settings

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Customize keyboard shortcuts for quick access to translation features

default.translate: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + T - Translate selected text
default.polish: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P - Polish selected text
default.summarize: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + S - Summarize selected text
default.vocabulary: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + V - Add to vocabulary

language.title: Default Languages
language.description: Set your source and target languages for quick translations

theme.title: Appearance
theme.description: Choose between light, dark, or system theme

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Configure when and how you receive notifications

translation.title: Translation
steps: Select any text in any application
Press the translation shortcut (default: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + T)
View the translation in the popup window
Copy, edit, or perform additional actions

screenshot.title: Screenshot Translation
steps: Press the screenshot shortcut (default: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X)
Select the area containing text
Wait for OCR processing
View and translate the extracted text

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary Book
vocabulary.description: To save words for later review:
steps: Select a word or phrase
Click 'Add to Vocabulary' in the translation window
Access your vocabulary book from the main menu
Review and practice saved words

apiError.title: API Key Error
apiError.description: If you see API errors, verify that your key is valid and has available credits

shortcut.title: Shortcut Not Working
shortcut.description: Make sure no other application is using the same keyboard shortcut

ocr.title: OCR Not Accurate
ocr.description: Ensure the screenshot has clear, well-lit text with good contrast

performance.title: Performance Issues
performance.description: Close unused applications and check your internet connection
